name: Tennis Champs: Win Cash
description:
Tennis Champs is a competitive multiplayer game where you can win prizes with your playing skills.

Playing tennis has never been easier than swiping your screen. But it takes careful timing and positioning of your swipes to prove that you are a tennis master.

Choose from different characters with different stats and playstyles.
Manage your stamina and accuracy as you wear down your opponent.
Dominate tournaments and win real cash!

WHAT WE OFFER
- Nuanced tennis gameplay
- Different characters and play styles
- Real Time PvP and Tournaments
- Real Money Prizes
- Skill-based Matchmaking

If you have any questions, please reach out at help@onjoyride.com.
